OCMath

Extended math utilities for real and complex number operations in OCTypes.

This header declares functions for working with complex numbers and performing numeric comparisons with precision tolerance, along with basic floor/ceil operations.

group OCMath

Mathematical utilities, including complex arithmetic and tolerant comparisons.

Functions

double cargument(double complex z)

Calculates the argument (phase angle) of a complex number.

Parameters:

  • z – Complex number.

Returns:

Argument of z in radians.

double complex ccbrt(double complex z)

Calculates the principal cube root of a complex number.

Parameters:

  • z – Complex number.

Returns:

Principal complex cube root of z.

double complex cqtrt(double complex z)

Calculates the principal fourth root of a complex number.

Parameters:

  • z – Complex number.

Returns:

Principal complex fourth root of z.

OCComparisonResult OCCompareFloatValues(float value, float otherValue)

Compares two float values using strict equality.

Parameters:

  • value – First float value.

  • otherValue – Second float value.

Returns:

Comparison result.

OCComparisonResult OCCompareDoubleValues(double value, double otherValue)

Compares two double values using strict equality.

Parameters:

  • value – First double value.

  • otherValue – Second double value.

Returns:

Comparison result.

OCComparisonResult OCCompareDoubleValuesLoose(double value, double otherValue)

Loosely compares two double values using a precision threshold.

Parameters:

  • value – First double value.

  • otherValue – Second double value.

Returns:

kOCCompareEqualTo if within epsilon; otherwise, result of strict comparison.

OCComparisonResult OCCompareFloatValuesLoose(float value, float otherValue)

Loosely compares two float values using a precision threshold.

Parameters:

  • value – First float value.

  • otherValue – Second float value.

Returns:

kOCCompareEqualTo if within epsilon; otherwise, result of strict comparison.

double OCDoubleFloor(double value)

Returns the largest integer not greater than the given double value.

Parameters:

  • value – A double-precision value.

Returns:

The floor of value.

double OCDoubleCeil(double value)

Returns the smallest integer not less than the given double value.

Parameters:

  • value – A double-precision value.

Returns:

The ceiling of value.

double complex complex_sine(double complex angle)

Computes the complex sine of a complex number.

Parameters:

  • angle – A complex angle in radians.

Returns:

Complex sine of angle.

double complex complex_cosine(double complex angle)

Computes the complex cosine of a complex number.

Parameters:

  • angle – A complex angle in radians.

Returns:

Complex cosine of angle.

double complex complex_tangent(double complex angle)

Computes the complex tangent of a complex number.

Parameters:

  • angle – A complex angle in radians.

Returns:

Complex tangent of angle.
